Mod0_Description: While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, every {c_number}{SF_5}{/c} Fury you spend increases {c_important}{u}Berserk's{/u}{/c} damage bonus by {c_number}[{SF_6}*100|%x|]{/c}.
Mod2_Description: While {c_important}Wrath of the Berserker{/c} is active, gain {c_number}[{SF_3} * 100|%+|]{/c} increased Movement Speed and increase Fury Generation by {c_number}[{SF_14} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
name: Wrath of the Berserker
